item.title: Stock to watch: Freshworks share price to be in focus on Monday after THIS step by Girish Mathrubootham

review.headline_rewrite: Stock to watch: Freshworks share price to be in focus on Monday after THIS step by Girish Mathrubootham
bullets: Stock to watch: The share price of Freshworks, a Nasdaq-listed software firm, is likely to be the focus of attention on Monday, September 8,
His decision to step down comes just one and a half years after he quit as the chief executive officer (CEO) of the software-as-a-service
Mathrubootham, who co-founded the company with Shanmugam Krishnasamy in 2010, will step down as chairman of the board and retire on December 1, 2025.

item.title: Buy or sell: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday — 8 September 2025

review.headline_rewrite: Buy or sell: Sumeet Bagadia recommends three stocks to buy on Monday — 8 September 2025
bullets: Buy or sell stocks: The Indian stock market ended flat on Friday, September 5, on profit booking as concerns over Trump tariffs and their
The Sensex and the Nifty 50 market benchmarks opened higher but failed to hold gains despite positive global cues on expectations of a US
The Sensex slipped 7 points to end at 80,710.76, while the Nifty 50 ended at 24,741, up 7 points.
The BSE Midcap index fell 0.10 per cent, while the Smallcap index increased by 0.09 per cent.

item.title: Adani Power partners with Bhutan for 570MW hydro project worth ₹6,000 crore

review.headline_rewrite: Adani Power partners with Bhutan for 570MW hydro project worth ₹6,000 crore
bullets: Adani Power and Bhutan’s state-owned Druk Green Power Corporation (DGPC) signed agreements today to develop a 570MW hydroelectric project in the Himalayan kingdom, requiring
The signing ceremony, attended by Bhutan Prime Minister Dasho Tshering Tobgay and Adani Group Chairman Gautam Adani, included a shareholders agreement, power purchase agreement
Bhutan plans to add 15,000MW in hydropower and 5,000MW in solar capacity by 2040 as part of its goal to become a high-income country.
